May 24, 1930 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
The Merry Wives of Windsor [Keighley]
Victoria Park, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £12 and shield, 3rd £9, 4th £6, 5th £3. March contest (Friendship) - 1st(£3) Spenborough Victoria, 2nd(£2) Hinchliffe Mill. 10th annual contest. 11 bands competed. Source - BBN June 1930
April 4, 2012, 9:09 p.m. April 7, 2014, 9:21 p.m.
1 Hade Edge William Pollard
2 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe
3 Hepworth Band Willie Kaye
4 Bentley Colliery W. Wormald
5 Spenborough Victoria Luther Dyson
